name: Leaf Envy
description:
Leaf Envy is designed to make plant parenthood simple. To help you re-connect with nature, we provide tailored plant recommendations, easy to understand/ personalised care advice, and quality but affordable plants delivered to your door. Since June 2019, 500+ customers across the UK have used Leaf Envy to grow their indoor jungle, and keep their plants healthy and happy. 

Why? We believe in the power of plants to make people happy, and believe in their fundamental importance to the sustainability of urban life. It's our mission to spread the joy of plants nationwide, and make it easy for more people to become plant people using a mix of technology and people. 

As featured in Forbes, Harpers Bazaar, Evening Standard, The Start Up Magazine and supported by Google for Start Ups.

team.name: Beth Chapman
team.bioHtml: Founder @Leaf Envy â€¢ Worked at @Qubit.

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Manager / Head of Growth
jobs.description:
DO YOU LOVE PLANTS? (who doesn't)

Have you got a green thumb?

Are you looking to work for an exciting start-up in a trending industry, and work closely with the founder to execute a growth strategy early-on? 

Yes?  Let's chat. 

We are a brand new/ modern-day plant brand on a mission to make plant parenthood simple, and we are looking for a full-stack digital marketeer to drive brand engagement, awareness and revenue. 

This is a unique opportunity to be part of our success early on. 

What you'll be doing: 

ðŸŒ´Defining & Executing SEM/SEO strategies to increase our rankings and traffic from organic search.
ðŸŒ´Defining strategies, projects and budgets for our digital advertising.
ðŸŒ´Implementing, managing, & optimising our digital advertising campaigns across channels (including Google, Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, and more)
ðŸŒ´Identifying new opportunities for traffic growth
ðŸŒ´Working with designers, copywriters and other team members to implement and launch new campaigns designed to drive revenue across web, and engagement on social/ email. 


What we are looking for: 

ðŸŒ¿A highly ambitious, self-starting individual with a proven record (3+ years) successfully creating and implementing online advertising, SEM and SEO strategies for e-commerce brands
ðŸŒ¿Experience building a comprehensive digital marketing strategy from the ground up
ðŸŒ¿Experience with digital advertising channels, including AdWords, Facebook (Instagram), Pinterest and others. 
ðŸŒ¿Strong analytical skills. Advanced user of Google Analytics and Excel. 
ðŸŒ¿A highly organised & motivated individual. Someone that is able to plan, manage and analyse everything they do. 
ðŸŒ¿Someone friendly and collaborative. A creative thinker that loves the opportunity to push through their own great ideas and driven to get stuff done.

Why you'll love us:

ðŸ’šYouâ€™ll be part of a small, competent, highly ambitious team 
ðŸ’šYou will own initiatives and have the autonomy to execute your plans
ðŸ’šBe part of an exciting growth industry that is ethically conscious 
ðŸ’šFlexible working hours, and a bunch of plant related perks (obviously) 
ðŸ’šExcellent tax-efficient equity scheme


This is a full-time role based in London with competitive salary & shares in the company. Please submit your cover letter and CV for consideration.
